name: Deepwater Dew Body Serum with Sea Moss and Aloe Stem Cells
categories: Bath & Body, Body Moisturizers, Body Lotions & Body Oils
about: What it is: A hydrating and lightweight body serum that nurtures and softens skin while leaving behind a dewy golden-hour sheen...Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily..Skincare Concerns: Dryness, Dullness, and Uneven Texture..Highlighted Ingredients:.- Sea Moss: A nutrient-rich seaweed that helps strengthen the skinu2019s moisture barrier..- Aloe Stem Cells: Soothes visible redness and irritation for soft, hydrated skin..- Evening Primrose Oil: Replenishes and moisturizes skin for a smooth, even-looking texture...Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan, gluten-free, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging...What Else You Need to Know: This body serum is formulated with sea moss, aloe stem cells, and evening primrose oil to nurture and replenish the moisture in your skin. Rich, yet rapidly absorbing, this body serum gives you a healthy skin glow without feeling heavy or sticky.
ingredients: -Sea Moss: A nutrient-rich seaweed that helps strengthen the skinu2019s moisture barrier..-Aloe Stem Cells: Soothes visible redness and irritation for soft, hydrated skin..-Evening Primrose Oil: Replenishes and moisturizes skin for a smooth, even-looking texture...Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Isopropyl Myristate, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil, Isododecane, Ethylene/Propylene/Styrene Copolymer, Mica, Chondrus Crispus Extract, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Extract, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Tocopherol, Camellia Oleifera Seed Oil, Oenothera Biennis (Evening Primrose) Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Butylene/Ethylene/Styrene Copolymer, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Phenoxyethanol, Iron Oxides (CI 77491), Titanium Dioxide (CI77891).
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply all over body, particularly to arms, legs, and du00e9colletage. .-Massage and rub in thoroughly for best absorption and a smooth-skin finish..-Allow the product to set before putting on clothing. .-Use right after the shower or on its own before a night out...Recycling Instructions:.-This bottle is made from 30% post-consumer recycled plastic..-Twist off pump and dispose..-Rinse out the bottle prior to placing it in your recycling bin, along with the cap..-All CAY SKIN cartons are made from 100% FSC-certified paperboard. Place them in your paper recycling bin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you love a good body sheen without glitter or the oily mess of some body oils, this is the one for you. there's not much of a scent so you can use your perfumes as needed as well. I put this all over my arms and chest, and my legs if I'm wearing a short skirt or shorts and it makes my whole body look so glowy. I get people commenting on it all the time. it makes my skin feel nice and hydrated too, and it doesn't catch on any dry patches I may have. it also makes me feel luxurious.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Staple for my chocolate girlies! it reminds me of Rihannau2019s fenty butta with the shimmer! I mix it with a little bit of water so it spreads better but the glooooooow ! worth the coins

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I like the subtle glow- but itu2019s nothing special. Pretty expensive for how much you get. There is no scent at all so it just smells a bit waxy and meh. I was hoping it had a coconutty scent. I think there are other products like this one for less.
